article.title: Army Extends Lockheed Martin's M299 Launcher Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has received a $31.3 million contract modification to provide additional M299 launchers and related equipment to the U.S. Army. Under the modification, Lockheed Martin will supply an additional 298 M299 helicopter-mounted four-rail missile launchers, 134 launcher electronic assemblies (LEAs) and multiple spares.
